item.title: treeio: Base classes and functions for parsing and exporting phylogenetic tree
item.description:
The treeio package defines classes and functions for parsing and exporting phylogenetic trees. treeio is released within the Bioconductor project and the source code is hosted on GitHub. Authors Guangchuang Yu and Tommy Tsan-Yuk Lam, School of Public Health, The University of Hong Kong.
Citation treeio was splitted from ggtree package, please cite the following article when using treeio:
